    • isVictory

      public boolean isVictory​(Player player, Pawn oldPawn, Pawn newPawn)
      Method that allows us to know if a player has aligned 3 checkers (in any direction)
      Parameters:
      player - To find out which player should move these pawns
      oldPawn - The old placement of our player's pawn
      newPawn - The new placement of our player's pawn
      Returns:
      True if there are 3 pawns aligned.
